mapper.sql: select distinct r.id, r.role_char, r.role_name, r.created_at, r.updated_at from role r left join user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id left join user u on u.id = ur.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into role( role_char, role_name, created_at, updated_at )values ( #{roleChar}, #{roleName}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.select: select id from role where role_name = #{roleName}
